resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/COPY FROM AZURE SQL TO AZURE SYNAPSE')]

activities.name: COPY FROM AZURE SQL TO AZURE SYNAPSE

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  salesheader.OrderDate,    salesheader.SalesOrderID,   salesheader.CustomerID,  salesheader.SubTotal,  salesheader.TaxAmt,   salesheader.Freight,   SalesOrderDetail.ProductID,   SalesOrderDetail.UnitPrice,  SalesOrderDetail.LineTotal,   SalesOrderDetail.OrderQty FROM   SalesLT.SalesOrderHeader as salesheader 
   INNER JOIN   SalesLT.SalesOrderDetail SalesOrderDetail    ON salesheader.SalesOrderID=SalesOrderDetail.SalesOrderID
